title: Meeting Action Items
description: Extracted action items from a meeting transcript

has_action_items.description: Whether the meeting contains any action items (true if action_items array is not empty, false otherwise)

meeting_date.description: The date of the meeting in YYYY-MM-DD format

participants.description: List of meeting participants ordered by who spoke the most

speaking_count.description: Approximate number of times this person spoke

action_items.description: List of action items from the meeting

title.description: Action item title. REQUIRED FORMAT: 'AI - [FU - ]<up to 10 word summary>'. Include 'FU - ' (follow-up) prefix ONLY if assigned to someone else. Omit 'FU - ' if assigned to Haje. Example: 'AI - FU - Contact client about Q1 budget' or 'AI - Update presentation slides'.

assigned_to.description: Person responsible for this action item - FIRST NAME ONLY (e.g., 'Sarah', 'Marcus', 'Haje'). Use 'Haje' if assigned to the meeting organizer.

summary.description: Brief summary of the action item (up to 10 words)

description.description: Full description of the action item (up to 1 paragraph)

mentioned_in_context.description: The time or context in the meeting where this was discussed

discussion_point.description: Discussion point to offload to a future 1x1 meeting with the assigned person. Include context about why this needs deeper conversation.

slack_message.description: Pre-formatted Slack message to send as a followup reminder about this action item. Do NOT include the recipient's name in the message.
